sentences: Phillip Bruce Danyew (born October 31, 1986) is a singer, multi-instrumentalist, songwriter, and producer.
Danyew was born as Phillip Bruce Danyew on October 31, 1986 in Orange County, California.
Danyew started his music career in 2006, yet his first extended play, The EP, was not independently released until February 17, 2009.
In 2011, Danyew created a band, Hitpoints.
He joined the band Foster the People in late 2013 as a touring member.
